snippet.title: Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak - A New Frontier (Nintendo Switch / Steam)
snippet.description:
Venture into a lush locale, the Jungle, as your quest to save the Kingdom brings you face to face with dangerous new monsters.

Plus, sneak a glimpse at what awaits you beyond #Sunbreak's launch on June 30th with our first free title update…

Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak arrives on Nintendo Switch and PC / Steam on June 30, 2022.
https://www.monsterhunter.com/rise-sunbreak/en-us/

Start your journey today in Monster Hunter Rise, available now!
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/monster-hunter-rise-switch/
Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1446780/MONSTER_HUNTER_RISE/

Japanese https://youtu.be/6ga6RUMfQBQ
French https://youtu.be/gCAvJhfCacw
Italian https://youtu.be/QQ2LRzw787w
German https://youtu.be/_niKoWDFBxM
Spanish https://youtu.be/OeBMGdkz-FM
Russian https://youtu.be/kFOAEYzYAD8
Polish https://youtu.be/qPe57E7HcCI
Brazilian Portuguese https://youtu.be/cE088JnCc-M
Traditional Chinese https://youtu.be/joHHs0uHdIo
Simplified Chinese https://youtu.be/gnhPubFJRiU
Korean https://youtu.be/NzCcPIkAJqw

https://discord.gg/capcom
https://www.facebook.com/monsterhunter
https://twitter.com/monsterhunter
https://www.instagram.com/monsterhuntergame/
https://www.youtube.com/monsterhunter
